newsitem.title: USA: Los Angeles council meets on sports complex plan.
newsitem.headline: Los Angeles council meets on sports complex plan.

text.p: The Los Angeles City Council met on Wednesday in closed session to consider a proposed downtown sports complex, but city officials said more discussions were needed.
Los Angeles Council President John Ferraro said the meeting was productive.
Officials said the city council was expected to be briefed again on the negotiations next week.
Once the negotiation period closes and the proposed agreement is drafted, Ferraro said public hearings would be held before any final vote was taken.
